document_data.name: The Ascension of Vlaakith
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Ascension of Vlaakith''''' was a [[githyanki]] book that contained a narrative of the ascension of [[Vlaakith CLVII]] to the throne, as well as a discussion on the importance of [[arcane magic]] to githyanki society.
document_data.Description:
The book was written in [[Gith language|Gith]]. Its account of Vlaakith's rise to absolute power emphasized her reliance upon arcane magic, arguing that she would not have succeeded without it.

The book's discussion on arcane power stated that [[wizard]]ry was fundamental to the githyanki's plans of defeating their enemies and eventually ruling the [[multiverse]].
document_data.Notable Owners: The [[gish]] [[Vheza]] owned a copy of ''The Ascension of Vlaakith'', which she read while living in [[Stardock]] in {{Yearlink|1492}}.{{Waterdeep-time}}
